definitions: with consideration of or in preparation for the future

examples.text: when a legislature decides to change the law, it usually does so prospectively

shortDefinitions: with consideration of or in preparation for future

definitions: in order to discover what is likely to happen in the future

examples.text: he has been prospectively studying his patients since 1997
newborn infants were followed prospectively through the first two years of life

shortDefinitions: in order to discover what is likely to happen
